scripts.build: npm run build:css && npx tailwindcss -i assets/css/tailwind.css -o public/tailwind.build.css && wp-scripts build && npx babel assets/js/OrganizationSubmissionForm.jsx -o assets/js/ap-org-submission.js && npx babel assets/js/SidebarMenu.jsx -o assets/js/sidebar-menu.js && npx babel assets/js/dashboard.jsx -o assets/js/ap-dashboard.js
